title: Wand of light
data:
{{version031}} {{item |itemtype = Wand |name = Wand of light |cost = ? }} {{flavour|A magical device which fires a ray of searing light, injuring and blinding those struck. Only living, demonic, and angelic monsters can be blinded. Tougher monsters will recover their vision more quickly.}} The '''wand of light''' fires a powerful, somewhat inaccurate, ray of light which [[blind]]s enemies. It can pierce through monsters like a bolt. Players will deal 4d(5.5 + 10.5 * [[Evocations]]/20) untyped damage with this wand.{{source ref|0.31.0|zap-data.h|1424}}
Specifically, you'll deal 4d(13/4 + 3 * pow/20) damage, for pow = 15 + 3.5 * Evocations ({{source ref|0.31.0|evoke.cc|189}}). If you have the [[MP-Powered Wands]] mutation, then your "pow" gains a +33% boost. Players have a [[to-hit]] of 10.6 + (3.5 * Evocations)/25.{{source ref|0.31.0|zap-data.h|1425}} Monsters will deal 3d(7 + (30 + [[HD]])/12) damage with this wand.{{source ref|0.31.0|zap-data.h|1426}} When the wand damages a valid monster, it has a 100% chance to blind it for 54/[[HD]] to 2 * 54/HD turns (min. 1-2 turns).{{source ref|0.31.0|beam.cc|4883}} [[Nonliving]], [[holiness#Plant|plant]], and [[undead]] holiness monsters cannot be blinded, and a few others are [[:Category:Unblindable|immune]]. If it deals damage to the player, it has a 1/3 chance of [[confuse|confusing]] them for 2-3 turns instead.{{source ref|0.31.0|beam.cc|4050}} It is [[alternate items|mutually exclusive]] with the [[wand of acid]] and [[wand of quicksilver]]. ==Tips & Tricks== Wands of light inflict strong, untyped damage and disables monsters for a few turns. When blinded, monsters treat you as [[invisible]] (even with [[see invisible]]), it'll make them less likely to hit or use abilities. Thus, it is valuable as both an offensive and defensive tool. Light can be especially useful for [[stab]]bers, since it can blind monsters regardless of their HD or willpower. It can't blind [[orbs of fire]], but it can blind [[pandemonium lord]]s and other types of tough opponents. ==History== {{CBA|0.32|players will be blinded instead of confused when damaged by a wand of light.}} *Piror to [[0.31]], wands of light could blind [[nonliving]] and [[undead]] monsters. *The wand of light was added in [[0.29]]. ==References== {{wands}}
